narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Mcs, PC is a Counselor, Professional provider based in Silver Spring, MD. From the 2018–2024 period, this provider received $14.5M in Medicaid payments across 41K claims.

narrative.title: Why This Matters
narrative.text: At $14.5M in Medicaid payments, this provider represents significant public healthcare spending. Understanding where these dollars go helps ensure the program serves those who need it most.
